I promise, it'll just be you and me."User's breath hitched as he met Jenny's eyes, the heat of their shared desire almost palpable. "I... I've never really talked about this with anyone else." He swallowed hard, his gaze flickering to Jenny's hand resting on his wrist before meeting her eyes again.
